head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCARDLE, JOAN F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCARDLE, JOAN F.

block.p: McARDLE-Joan F. On September 17, 2000. Beloved daughter of James Joseph and Mary G. McArdle. Loving sister of the late Mary Ruth, James J., Richard W., Sheila Byrons and Vincent. Also survived by twenty-four nieces and nephews and thirty-three great-nieces and nephews. Retired President of McCarthy and Associates. Reposing at Dennis S. O'Connor Inc, 91-05 Beach Channel Drive, Rockaway Beach. Mass of Christian Burial at St. Genevieve's Church, Wednesday, at 10 AM. Interment, St. Charles Cemetery. Visiting Tuesday, 2-5 and 7-10 PM.
